snippet.title: The Hip Hop Dance Experience | Trailer [NORTH AMERICA]
snippet.description:
Drop it like it's hot with hip hop's hottest dance game. The Hip Hop Dance Experience is the first authentic hip hop game in the dance category. Dance to the most popular tracks of the genre with original moves designed by the most famous hip hop choreographers. Trigger lavish visual effects worthy of the best music videos and customize your avatar like never before. Experience the world of hip hop through music, dance, and design with The Hip Hop Dance Experience. Take the floor.

Join the crew on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheHipHopDanceExperience
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/HHDExperience
Visit us at http://www.TheHipHopDanceExperience.com
